member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the renderer uses the application state to determine rendering style.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.EnhanceGroupBoxRenderer.DrawEnhanceGroupBox(Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.IControlElements,Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.IBorderElements,Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.IHeaderElements,Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.IInsideBorderElements,System.Boolean,Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.EnhanceGroupBoxState)
member.summary: Draws a group box control in the specified state and bounds, with the specified group-box, graphics and state.
member.param: IControlElements implementation class used for drawing user defined group box control.
IBorderElements implemented class used for drawing user defined boarder elements.
IHeaderElements implemented class used for drawing user defined header elements.
IInsideBorderElements implemented class used for drawing user defined inside boarder elements.
Boolean value specifies one of the graphical element has changed and control rendering needs updating.
One of the EnhanceGroupBoxState values that specifies the visual state of the group box.

member.name: M:Ekstrand.Drawing.GraphicsExtension.DrawRoundedRectangle(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Pen,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,Ekstrand.Windows.Forms.BorderCorners)
member.summary: Draws a rounded rectangle with specified parameters.
member.param: An encapsulated GDI+ drawing surface instance.
Pen that determines the color, width, and style of the rectangle.
The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to draw.
The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle to draw.
Width of the rectangle to draw.
Height of the rectangle to draw.
The radius for each corners
The corners to have a radius
